de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICAnswer


  • public interface ICAnswer
    provides functions to manage the answer objects Answer.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getAnswerAPI().load(id);

    • Method Summary

      • findExternalAnswer

        List<SearchExternalAnswerResult> findExternalAnswer(String emailadress,
                                                  String subject,
                                                  String content,
                                                  String comment,
                                                  int emailType,
                                                  int operatorId,
                                                  String statusText,
                                                  List<Integer> subprojects,
                                                  List<Long> date,
                                                  boolean useSendDate)
        Return all the answers with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        emailadress - Email address of the answer
        subject - Title
        content - Content
        comment - Comment
        emailType - Emailtype
        operatorId - Operator id
        statusText - Status
        subprojects - Ids of subprojects to be searched in what the answer
        date - Date
        useSendDate -
        Returns:
        List list of SearchExternalAnswerResult that contains searched answer id and his question id and his case id
        was:
        externeSucheAntwort
